text.label: Text
text.help: Use for labels, instructions, and any static text that won't change based on card data

field.label: Field
field.description: Dynamic field reference from your note type
field.help: Reference card data fields like {{Front}}, {{Back}}, {{Extra}}. Field names are case-sensitive

image.label: Image
image.help: Field should contain image path or URL. Images are displayed at their natural size or constrained by CSS

video.label: Video
video.help: Field should contain video source path or URL. Supports MP4, WebM, and other HTML5 video formats

audio.label: Audio
audio.help: Field should contain audio file path. Use HTML audio controls for playback

container.label: Container
container.help: Wraps other components for layout and styling purposes. Containers can be nested

row.label: Row
row.help: Displays child components in a horizontal row. Use flex layout for responsive design

column.label: Column
column.help: Displays child components vertically. Useful for stacking elements

divider.label: Divider
divider.help: Separates content sections visually. Can be styled with color, width, and height

heading.label: Heading
heading.help: Use for hierarchical content organization. Choose heading level based on content structure

button.label: Button
button.help: Can trigger JavaScript functions or link to URLs. Add event handlers as needed

link.label: Link
link.help: Creates clickable links. Use href attribute to specify link target

list.label: List
list.help: Displays items in list format. Use ordered for numbered lists, unordered for bullet points

table.label: Table
table.description: Data table with rows and columns
table.help: Organize tabular data. Define columns, rows, and cell content

cloze.label: Cloze
cloze.help: Hide specific text from display on question side. Use {{cloze:FieldName}} syntax

hint.label: Hint
hint.help: Content is hidden by default and revealed when user clicks. Use for supplementary information

conditional.label: Conditional
conditional.description: Show/hide content based on field value
conditional.help: Content is displayed only if the referenced field is not empty. Use {{#FieldName}}...{{/FieldName}}

badge.label: Badge
badge.help: Display status, category, or small pieces of information

card.label: Card
card.help: Styled container for grouped content. Can have border, shadow, and background color
